entry.tran: 各式各样的;五颜六色的;混杂的
entry.def: A group of assorted things is a group of similar things that are of different sizes or colours or have different qualities.

example.ex: It should be a great week, with overnight stops in assorted hotels in the West Highlands.
example.tran: 那一周会过得很开心，晚上可以在西部高地上的各式旅馆里过夜。

means.word_mean: 1. consisting of a haphazard assortment of different kinds (even to the point of incongruity);

sentences.sentence: "a mixed program of baroque and contemporary music"
"sundry sciences commonly known as social"- I.A.Richards

means.word_mean: 2. of many different kinds purposefully arranged but lacking any uniformity;
